summary: A woman of English extraction born in the German city of Ingelheim in the ninth century disguises herself as a man and rises through the Vatican ranks.
cast: Johanna Wokalek|David Wenham|John Goodman|Iain Glen|Edward Petherbridge|Anatole Taubman|Lotte Flack|Tigerlily Hutchinson|Jördis Triebel|Oliver Cotton|Nicholas Woodeson|Suzanne Bertish|Richard van Weyden|Branko Tomovic|Lenn Kudrjawizki|Ian Gelder|Alexander Held|Sandro Lohmann|Christian Redl|Claudia Michelsen|Marc Bischoff|Tom Strauss|Alberto Cracco|Giorgio Lupano|Marian Meder|Oliver Nägele|Katrin Pollitt|Raúl Semmler|Hendrik Arnst|Lukas T. Berglund|Isabel Bongard|Claudia Geisler-Bading|Christoph Glaubacker|Colin Goodwin|Heinrich Hadding|Kristina Karst|Ellie Kemish|Frank Kessler|Jan-Hendrik Kiefer|William Stütz|Georg Tryphon|Frank Witter|Paulina Bachmann|Amber Bongard|Mike Braun|Rupert Degas|Jack Flack|Thomas Glas|Mechthild Großmann|Sven Hönig|Sebastian Hülk|Steffen Jurk|Heiko Kiesow|Michael Knöfler|Gerard Krause|Robert Meller|Wolfgang Packhäuser|Lutz Potthoff|Tabitha Christina Rieger|Jolly Serra|Amara Wagner|Maraile Wagner|Barbara Wittman|Mohamed Zerwal
title: La mujer papa
